long_description: Hop off the plain, train or bus ready for a serious day's adventure in the prAna Terri jacket. It gives you an extra layer of protection against the elements with lightweight, versatile style. Nylon exterior benefits from a Durable Water Repellent finish that lets water bead up and roll off, keeping you dry in light rain. Added stretch allows full range of motion and enhances comfort; wrinkle-resistant fabric makes the prAna Terri jacket a great travel piece. Two front zippered pockets secure small essentials. Hood is lined; body is unlined; full-zip front is hidden by the front placket. Closeout.
short_description: Hop off the plain, train or bus ready for a serious day's adventure in the prAna Terri jacket. It gives you an extra layer of protection against the elements with lightweight, versatile style.
